content: During this fight, you will also want to ensure you get the boss to break the wall with the statues in the arena, by charging or hitting it with a powerful attack. This will open up another area, and allow you to access the Loong Scales key item.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Arhat_Gold_Piece.md', within the main section titled 'Arhat Gold Piece'.
The content is as follows:
During this fight, you will also want to ensure you get the boss to break the wall with the statues in the arena, by charging or hitting it with a powerful attack. This will open up another area, and allow you to access the Loong Scales key item.
